title: Russia to block Instagram over ‘death to invaders’ posting rule
content:
1. Russia to block Instagram over ‘death to invaders’ posting rule  Al Jazeera English
  2. Meta defends policy on allowing violent rhetoric towards Russia, insists it won't tolerate 'Russophobia'  Fox News
  3. Russia opens criminal case against Meta following temporary hate speech policy change  CNN
  4. Facebook owner defends policy on calls for violence that angered Russia  Reuters
  5. Russia demands US stop Meta for 'inciting hatred against citizens'  Fox News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Russia to block Instagram over ‘death to invaders’ posting rule  Al Jazeera English
Meta defends policy on allowing violent rhetoric towards Russia, insists it won't tolerate 'Russophobia'  Fox News
Russia opens criminal case against Meta following temporary hate speech policy change  CNN
Facebook owner defends policy on calls for violence that angered Russia  Reuters
Russia demands US stop Meta for 'inciting hatred against citizens'  Fox News

localize.title: ロシア、「侵略者に死を」投稿ルールでInstagramをブロックへ
俄罗斯因 "入侵者之死 "的发帖规则封锁Instagram
